creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: ocean beach scene: beach with large rock at LR; gentle waves lapping against sandy beach; small rock formation at center; various boats in middle ground; taller, larger rock formation at L in horizon
marks: Left: [自摺　昭和三年作　大原海岸] {Jizuri, Shōwa sannen saku,  LRC, in image: [よし田] {Yoshida}
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: Ohara Beach
